ethnologue_comment.comment: E16/E17/E18/E19/E20/E21/E22/E23/E24/E25/E26 has an entry Yamongeri [ymg] which does not appear in the E16/E17/E18/E19/E20/E21/E22/E23/E24/E25/E26 maps. Its location is specified only as ``Equateur province: south of Congo river'', but this and the name is sufficient to locate the group (**hh:hv:HackettvanBulck:ETeam**:72). This group speaks a variety of Mongo [lol] (**hh:g:Hulstaert:Dialectologie-Mongo**) and indeed the E16/E17/E18/E19/E20/E21/E22/E23/E24/E25/E26 maps mark the territory where it is spoken as Mongo [lol]. See also: Mongo [lol].

meds: Hackett, Peter and van Bulck, Gaston [Vaast] 1956
